TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EncodingProvider extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供编码提供程序的基类，后者提供在特定平台上不可用的编码。

span.span: Provides the base class for an encoding provider, which supplies encodings that are unavailable on a particular platform.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编码提供程序提供了编码，否则不是适用于特定的目标平台。An encoding provider supplies encodings that are not otherwise available on a particular target platform. 在 Windows 桌面.NET Framework 支持大量的字符编码和代码页。The .NET Framework on the Windows desktop supports a large number of character encodings and code pages. 可以在 Windows 桌面上获取编码在.NET Framework 中可用的完整列表，通过调用方法。You can get a complete list of encodings available in the .NET Framework on the Windows desktop by calling the method. .NET core，但是，默认情况下支持仅以下编码：.NET Core, on the other hand, by default supports only the following encodings: - ASCII （代码页为 20127） 返回的属性。ASCII (code page 20127), which is returned by the property. - ISO-8859-1 （代码页 28591）。ISO-8859-1 (code page 28591). - UTF-7、utf （代码页为 65000） 即属性。UTF-7 (code page 65000), which is returned by the property. - Utf-8 （代码页 65001），该值由返回属性。UTF-8 (code page 65001), which is returned by the property. - UTF-16 和 UTF-16LE （代码页 1200年），该值由返回属性。UTF-16 and UTF-16LE (code page 1200), which is returned by the property. - UTF 16BE （代码页 1201年），它通过调用实例化或构造函数与`bigEndian`的值`true`。UTF-16BE (code page 1201), which is instantiated by calling the or constructor with a `bigEndian` value of `true`. - UTF-32 和 UTF-32LE （代码页 12000），该值由返回属性。UTF-32 and UTF-32LE (code page 12000), which is returned by the property. - UTF-32BE （代码页 12001），它通过调用实例化构造函数具有`bigEndian`参数并提供的值`true`方法调用中。UTF-32BE (code page 12001), which is instantiated by calling an constructor that has a `bigEndian` parameter and providing a value of `true` in the method call. 从.NET Framework 4.6，开始是基类，否则将无法供.NET Framework 的编码。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.6, is the base class that makes otherwise unavailable encodings available to the .NET Framework. 这包括以下步骤：This involves the following steps: 1. 定义的一个子类重写两个抽象重载，和。Define a subclass of that overrides the two abstract overloads, and . 这些重载将返回被不受支持的编码代码页标识符和名称。These overloads return the otherwise unsupported encoding by code page identifier and by name. 请注意，您还可以选择返回默认编码如果0 的参数调用方法。Note that you can also choose to return a default encoding if the method is called with an argument of 0. 2. （可选） 你可以重写虚拟和方法。Optionally, you can override the virtual and methods. 在大多数情况下，这不是必需，因为基类提供了默认实现。In most cases, this is not necessary, since the base class provides a default implementation. 3. 传递实例向方法，使提供的编码到公共语言运行时可用的对象。Pass the instance to the method to make the encodings supplied by the object available to the common language runtime. 4. 调用重载来检索的编码。Call an overload to retrieve the encoding. 方法将调用相应以确定是否可以提供所请求编码。The method will call the corresponding to determine whether it can supply the requested encoding. .NET Framework 类库提供了一个静态属性， ，返回对象，它提供完整的编码集上桌面.NET Framework 类库可供[!INCLUDE[net_core](~/includes/net-core-md.md)]应用程序。The .NET Framework Class Library provides one static property, , that returns an object that makes the full set of encodings available on the desktop .NET Framework Class Library available to [!INCLUDE[net_core](~/includes/net-core-md.md)] applications. 此外，您可以从派生类，以提供您自己的编码。In addition, you can derive from the class to make your own encodings available.

span.span: CodePagesEncodingProvider.Instance Property

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

Returns an encoding.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Text.Encoding GetEncoding (int codepage);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Text.Encoding GetEncoding(int32 codepage) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetEncoding (codepage As Integer) As Encoding
public: abstract System::Text::Encoding ^ GetEncoding(int codepage);
abstract member GetEncoding : int -> System.Text.Encoding

param.name: codepage
param.span: 所请求编码的代码页标识符。

span.span: The code page identifier of the requested encoding.

summary.span: 返回与指定代码页标识符关联的编码。

span.span: Returns the encoding associated with the specified code page identifier.

returns.span: 与指定代码页关联的编码，如果此 无法返回对应于 的有效编码，则为 。

span.span: The encoding that is associated with the specified code page, or if this cannot return a valid encoding that corresponds to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ### 继承者说明Notes to inheritors 重写[GetEncoding(Int32)]()方法返回编码或支持的编码您子类。You override the [GetEncoding(Int32)]() method to return the encoding or encodings supported by your subclass. 当用户代码试图检索通过调用的编码[GetEncoding(Int32)]()方法，该方法传递`codepage`到每个已注册编码提供程序，直到其中一个返回的有效编码的标识符。When user code attempts to retrieve an encoding by calling the [GetEncoding(Int32)]() method, the method passes the `codepage` identifier to every registered encoding provider until one returns a valid encoding. 如果无返回的有效编码[GetEncoding(Int32)]()方法会尝试检索其代码页标识符是缓存的编码`codepage`。If none returns a valid encoding, the [GetEncoding(Int32)]() method attempts to retrieve a cached encoding whose code page identifier is `codepage`. 因此，如果`codepage`不是代码页标识符的编码的支持，该方法应返回`null`; 它应永远不会引发异常。Because of this, if `codepage` is not the code page identifier of an encoding that you support, the method should return `null`; it should never throw an exception. 请注意，您还可以选择返回默认代码页，如果的值`codepage`自变量为 0。Note that you can also choose to return a default code page if the value of the `codepage` argument is 0. ## 调用方说明Notes to callers 调用此方法[Encoding.GetEncoding(Int32)]()方法。This method is called by the [Encoding.GetEncoding(Int32)]() method. 您不应直接从用户代码调用它。You should not call it directly from user code.

para.span: 重写方法返回编码或支持的编码您子类。

span.span: You override the method to return the encoding or encodings supported by your subclass.

para.span: 当用户代码试图检索通过调用的编码方法，该方法传递到每个已注册编码提供程序，直到其中一个返回的有效编码的标识符。

span.span: When user code attempts to retrieve an encoding by calling the method, the method passes the identifier to every registered encoding provider until one returns a valid encoding.

para.span: 如果无返回的有效编码方法尝试检索其代码页标识符是缓存的编码。

span.span: If none returns a valid encoding, the method attempts to retrieve a cached encoding whose code page identifier is .

para.span: 因此，如果不是代码页标识符的编码的支持，该方法应返回; 它应永远不会引发异常。

span.span: Because of this, if is not the code page identifier of an encoding that you support, the method should return ; it should never throw an exception.

para.span: 调用此方法方法。

span.span: This method is called by the method.

para.span: 您不应直接从用户代码调用它。

span.span: You should not call it directly from user code.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Text.Encoding GetEncoding (string name);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Text.Encoding GetEncoding(string name) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetEncoding (name As String) As Encoding
public: abstract System::Text::Encoding ^ GetEncoding(System::String ^ name);
abstract member GetEncoding : string -> System.Text.Encoding

span.span: The name of the requested encoding.

summary.span: 返回具有指定名称的编码。

span.span: Returns the encoding with the specified name.

returns.span: 与指定名称关联的编码，如果此 无法返回对应于 的有效编码，则为 。

span.span: The encoding that is associated with the specified name, or if this cannot return a valid encoding that corresponds to .

remarks.format: ## 继承者说明Notes to inheritors 重写[GetEncoding(String)]()方法返回编码或支持的编码您子类。You override the [GetEncoding(String)]() method to return the encoding or encodings supported by your subclass. 当用户代码试图检索通过调用的编码[GetEncoding(String)]()方法，该方法传递`name`到每个已注册编码提供程序，直到其中一个返回的有效编码的参数。When user code attempts to retrieve an encoding by calling the [GetEncoding(String)]() method, the method passes the `name` argument to every registered encoding provider until one returns a valid encoding. 如果无返回的有效编码[GetEncoding(String)]()方法会尝试检索其名称是缓存的编码`name`。If none returns a valid encoding, the [GetEncoding(String)]() method attempts to retrieve a cached encoding whose name is `name`. 因此，如果`name`不是名称的支持，该方法应返回的编码`null`。Because of this, if `name` is not the name of an encoding that you support, the method should return `null`. 该方法应在其中引发异常的唯一情况是如果`name`是`null`。The only case in which the method should throw an exception is if `name` is `null`. ## 调用方说明Notes to callers 调用此方法[encoding.getencoding （string)]()方法。This method is called by the [Encoding.GetEncoding(String)]() method. 您不应直接从用户代码调用它。You should not call it directly from user code.

para.span: 重写方法返回编码或支持的编码您子类。

span.span: You override the method to return the encoding or encodings supported by your subclass.

span.span: If none returns a valid encoding, the method attempts to retrieve a cached encoding whose name is .

para.span: 因此，如果不是名称的支持，该方法应返回的编码。

span.span: Because of this, if is not the name of an encoding that you support, the method should return .

para.span: 该方法应在其中引发异常的唯一情况是如果是。

span.span: The only case in which the method should throw an exception is if is .

para.span: 调用此方法方法。

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Text.Encoding GetEncoding (int codepage, System.Text.EncoderFallback encoderFallback, System.Text.DecoderFallback decoderFallback);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Text.Encoding GetEncoding(int32 codepage, class System.Text.EncoderFallback encoderFallback, class System.Text.DecoderFallback decoderFallback) cil managed
public: virtual System::Text::Encoding ^ GetEncoding(int codepage, System::Text::EncoderFallback ^ encoderFallback, System::Text::DecoderFallback ^ decoderFallback);

abstract member GetEncoding : int * System.Text.EncoderFallback * System.Text.DecoderFallback -> System.Text.Encoding override this.GetEncoding : int * System.Text.EncoderFallback * System.Text.DecoderFallback -> System.Text.Encoding

param.name: codepage
param.span: 所请求编码的代码页标识符。

span.span: The code page identifier of the requested encoding.

param.name: encoderFallback
param.span: 一个对象，在无法用此编码对字符进行编码时，该对象可用来提供错误处理过程。

span.span: An object that provides an error-handling procedure when a character cannot be encoded with this encoding.

param.name: decoderFallback
param.span: 一个对象，在无法用此编码对字节序列进行解码时，该对象可用来提供错误处理过程。

span.span: An object that provides an error-handling procedure when a byte sequence cannot be decoded with this encoding.

summary.span: 返回与指定代码页标识符关联的编码。

span.span: Returns the encoding associated with the specified code page identifier.

summary.span: 参数指定一个错误处理程序，用于处理无法编码的字符和无法解码的字节序列。

span.span: Parameters specify an error handler for characters that cannot be encoded and byte sequences that cannot be decoded.

returns.span: 与指定代码页关联的编码，如果此 无法返回对应于 的有效编码，则为 。

span.span: The encoding that is associated with the specified code page, or if this cannot return a valid encoding that corresponds to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `encoderFallback`和`decoderFallback`参数是对象以定义使用，如果编码器不能将字符转换为一个字节序列或解码器无法将一个字节序列转换为一个字符的回退策略。The `encoderFallback` and `decoderFallback` parameters are objects that define the fallback strategy used in the event that an encoder cannot convert a character to a sequence of bytes or a decoder cannot convert a sequence of bytes to a character. .NET Framework 提供了以下回退机制：The .NET Framework provides the following fallback mechanisms: - 异常回退。Exception fallback. 如果`encoderFallback`自变量是实例，或`decoderExceptionFallback`自变量是实例，编码的方法将引发异常，如果无法对字符进行编码，并且如果一个字节，解码方法将引发异常序列不能进行解码。If the `encoderFallback` argument is an instance of , or the `decoderExceptionFallback` argument is an instance of , the encoding method throws an exception if characters cannot be encoded, and the decoding method throws an exception if a byte sequence cannot be decoded. - 替换回退。Replacement fallback. 如果`encoderFallback`自变量是实例，或`decoderExceptionFallback`自变量是实例、 编码和解码方法代替替换字符串的字符不能进行编码和字节序列不能为解码。If the `encoderFallback` argument is an instance of , or the `decoderExceptionFallback` argument is an instance of , the encoding and decoding methods substitute a replacement string for characters that cannot be encoded and byte sequences cannot be decoded. 如果您通过调用默认构造函数实例化的替换回退对象，是替换字符"？"。If you instantiated the replacement fallback object by calling the default constructor, the replacement character is a "?". 如果您调用或构造函数中，可以指定替换字符串。If you call the or constructor, you can specify the replacement string. - 最佳回退。Best-fit fallback. 可以从派生或类，以实现最佳的替代机制。You can derive from the or class to implement a best-fit replacement mechanism.

para.span: 因为调用此方法使用的实现方法，您无需重写它。

span.span: Because calls to this method use your implementation of the method, you do not have to override it.

para.span: 当用户代码试图检索通过调用的编码方法，该方法传递到每个已注册编码提供程序，直到其中一个返回的有效编码的标识符。

span.span: When user code attempts to retrieve an encoding by calling the method, the method passes the identifier to every registered encoding provider until one returns a valid encoding.

para.span: 如果无返回的有效编码方法尝试检索其代码页标识符是缓存的编码。

span.span: If none returns a valid encoding, the method attempts to retrieve a cached encoding whose code page identifier is .

para.span: 因此，如果您选择要重写方法，重写应返回如果不是代码页标识符的编码的支持; 它应永远不会引发异常。

span.span: Because of this, if you do choose to override the method, your override should return if is not the code page identifier of an encoding that you support; it should never throw an exception.

para.span: 调用此方法方法。

span.span: This method is called by the method.

para.span: 您不应直接从用户代码调用它。

span.span: You should not call it directly from user code.

param.span: 一个对象，在无法用此编码对字符进行编码时，该对象可用来提供错误处理过程。

param.name: decoderFallback
param.span: 一个对象，在无法用当前编码对字节序列进行解码时，该对象可用来提供错误处理过程。

span.span: An object that provides an error-handling procedure when a byte sequence cannot be decoded with the current encoding.

summary.span: 返回与指定名称关联的编码。

span.span: Returns the encoding associated with the specified name.

summary.span: 参数指定一个错误处理程序，用于处理无法编码的字符和无法解码的字节序列。

span.span: Parameters specify an error handler for characters that cannot be encoded and byte sequences that cannot be decoded.

returns.span: 与指定名称关联的编码，如果此 无法返回对应于 的有效编码，则为 。

span.span: The encoding that is associated with the specified name, or if this cannot return a valid encoding that corresponds to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `encoderFallback`和`decoderFallback`参数是对象以定义使用，如果编码器不能将字符转换为一个字节序列或解码器无法将一个字节序列转换为一个字符的回退策略。The `encoderFallback` and `decoderFallback` parameters are objects that define the fallback strategy used in the event that an encoder cannot convert a character to a sequence of bytes or a decoder cannot convert a sequence of bytes to a character. .NET Framework 提供了以下回退机制：The .NET Framework provides the following fallback mechanisms: - 异常回退。Exception fallback. 如果`encoderFallback`自变量是实例，或`decoderExceptionFallback`自变量是实例，编码的方法将引发异常，如果无法对字符进行编码，并且如果一个字节，解码方法将引发异常序列不能进行解码。If the `encoderFallback` argument is an instance of , or the `decoderExceptionFallback` argument is an instance of , the encoding method throws an exception if characters cannot be encoded, and the decoding method throws an exception if a byte sequence cannot be decoded. - 替换回退。Replacement fallback. 如果`encoderFallback`自变量是实例，或`decoderExceptionFallback`自变量是实例、 编码和解码方法代替替换字符串的字符不能进行编码和字节序列不能为解码。If the `encoderFallback` argument is an instance of , or the `decoderExceptionFallback` argument is an instance of , the encoding and decoding methods substitute a replacement string for characters that cannot be encoded and byte sequences cannot be decoded. 如果您通过调用默认构造函数实例化的替换回退对象，是替换字符"？"。If you instantiated the replacement fallback object by calling the default constructor, the replacement character is a "?". 如果您调用或构造函数中，可以指定替换字符串。If you call the or constructor, you can specify the replacement string. - 最佳回退。Best-fit fallback. 可以从派生或类，以实现最佳的替代机制。You can derive from the or class to implement a best-fit replacement mechanism.

para.span: 因为调用此方法使用的实现方法，您无需重写它。

span.span: Because calls to this method use your implementation of the method, you do not have to override it.

para.span: 当用户代码试图检索通过调用的编码方法，该方法传递到每个已注册编码提供程序，直到其中一个返回的有效编码的标识符。

span.span: When user code attempts to retrieve an encoding by calling the method, the method passes the identifier to every registered encoding provider until one returns a valid encoding.

para.span: 如果无返回的有效编码方法尝试检索其代码页标识符是缓存的编码。

span.span: If none returns a valid encoding, the method attempts to retrieve a cached encoding whose code page identifier is .

para.span: 因此，如果您选择要重写方法，重写应返回如果不是代码页标识符的编码的支持; 它应永远不会引发异常。

span.span: Because of this, if you do choose to override the method, your override should return if is not the code page identifier of an encoding that you support; it should never throw an exception.

para.span: 调用此方法方法。

span.span: This method is called by the method.

para.span: 您不应直接从用户代码调用它。

span.span: You should not call it directly from user code.
